name: Corolla
description: The Toyota Corolla is a popular compact sedan due to its reliability and durability. The latest generation has a modern and sleek design and features a wide range of safety and advanced technology features.

name: Civic
description: The Honda Civic is a sporty compact sedan that offers exciting performance and agile handling. With its aerodynamic design and modern, spacious interior, it's perfect for those seeking a reliable and stylish vehicle.

name: Mustang
description: The Ford Mustang is an iconic sports car that combines style, power, and cutting-edge technology. From its muscular design to its V8 engine, the Mustang is a machine built for excitement and adventure.

name: CX-5
description: The Mazda CX-5 is a compact SUV that combines elegance, performance, and advanced technology. With its KODO design and SKYACTIV engine, the CX-5 offers an exciting and secure driving experience.

name: SUV A
description: The SUV A is a medium-sized sport utility vehicle that offers comfort and space for the whole family. It features advanced safety features and cutting-edge technology for a smooth and safe driving experience.
